Our best score.from sentence:
Natural Language Inference
Our best score on this task is 87.3 % accuracy obtained with the full tree matching NTI model .

performance.from sentence: Our results show that NTI - SLSTM improved the performance of the sequential LSTM encoder by approximately 2 % .

improve.from sentence: The node - by - node attention models improve the performance , indicating that modeling inter-sentence interaction is an important element in NLI .

has.from sentence:
Answer Sentence Selection
The Deep LSTM and LSTM attention models outperform the previous best result by a large margin , nearly 5 - 6 % .

NASM.from sentence: NASM improves the result further and sets a strong baseline by combining variational autoencoder with the soft attention .

exceeds.from sentence: Our NTI model exceeds NASM by approximately 0.4 % on MAP for this task .

Our NTI - SLSTM model.from sentence:
Sentence Classification
Our NTI - SLSTM model performed slightly worse A dog mouth holds a retrieved ball .

transformed.from sentence: After we transformed the input with the LSTM leaf node function , we achieved the best performance on this task .
